channel.title: Adding Gloabal Object-Bank Booth
channel.description: Okay, so i know how to add the Global Object of a bank booth, i just don't know how to make it so that when you right click and press "use quickly" it opens up [b]that[/b] interface. I'm guessing it would have to be in client.java but i could be wrong and most of the time i am. I know that the bank booth is in there properly because i can see the bank booth in the game and the code in Global Object is believed to be right, but again, may not be. I'll show you the code in Global Object: [code] makeGlobalObject(3430, 2900, 6084, -1, 10); // bank booth[/code] If you could help in any way with this problem it would be greatly appreciated.

@nic_ster91 wrote:

I’ve gotten it, must have been a malformed object ID because when i used your code, tom, came right up, thanks.

item.title: Adding Gloabal Object-Bank Booth

item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

[quote=“0wn3r tom, post:3, topic:221726”]if that code doesn’t work try this 1, this code is being used for all my banks maybe its working for you 2

makeGlobalObject(2893, 3531, 2213, -1, 10);//bankbooth[/quote] but make sure lol you change coords to right one.

item.title: Adding Gloabal Object-Bank Booth
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

That code looks ok, just add it to the bottom of your list of globalobjects, then compile and restart the server.

~I Lured I~

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Gloabal Object-Bank Booth
item.dc:creator: @nic_ster91 nic ster91
item.description:
@nic_ster91 wrote:

Okay, so i know how to add the Global Object of a bank booth, i just don’t know how to make it so that when you right click and press “use quickly” it opens up that interface. I’m guessing it would have to be in client.java but i could be wrong and most of the time i am. I know that the bank booth is in there properly because i can see the bank booth in the game and the code in Global Object is believed to be right, but again, may not be. I’ll show you the code in Global Object: makeGlobalObject(3430, 2900, 6084, -1, 10); // bank booth If you could help in any way with this problem it would be greatly appreciated.
